data.lyric:
[ti:Good Days (Explicit)]
[ar:SZA]
[al:Good Days (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.32]Good Days (Explicit) - SZA
[00:01.32]Lyrics by：Solána Rowe/Carter Lang/Christopher Ruelas/Carlos Muñoz/Jacob Collier
[00:04.09]Composed by：Solána Rowe/Carter Lang/Christopher Ruelas/Carlos Muñoz/Jacob Collier
[00:07.57]SZA：
[00:23.91]Good day in my mind safe to take a step out
[00:27.33]Get some air now let your edge out
[00:30.41]Too soon I spoke you be heavy in my mind
[00:33.41]Can you get the heck out
[00:35.29]I need rest now got me bummed out
[00:38.37]You so you so you baby baby babe
[00:42.83]I've been on my empty mind s**t
[00:46.76]I try to keep from losin' the rest of me
[00:50.49]I worry that I wasted the best of me on you baby
[00:54.68]You don't care
[00:56.43]Said "Not tryna be a nuisance it's just urgent"
[01:00.18]Tryna make sense of loose change
[01:01.98]Got me a war in my mind
[01:04.56]Gotta let go of weight can't keep what's holding me
[01:07.98]Choose to watch
[01:09.39]While the world break up and fall on me
[01:11.39]SZA/Jacob Collier：
[01:12.26]All the while I'll await my armored fate with a smile
[01:16.43]Still wanna try still believe in good days good days
[01:21.74]Always always always inside
[01:25.47]Good day living in my mind
[01:27.70]Tell me about my fears my limitations
[01:32.25]I'll disappear if you let me
[01:35.30]Feeling like yeah
[01:35.89]Woah
[01:36.89]Feeling like Jericho
[01:38.46]Feeling like Joe when he lost his s**t
[01:39.98]Gotta hold my own my cross to bear alone I
[01:43.18]Ooh paid a deal way to kill the mood
[01:48.65]Know you like that s**t getting good with it
[01:52.18]Baby baby heavy on my empty mind s**t
[01:58.20]I gotta keep from losin' the rest of me
[02:01.01]Rest of me
[02:02.12]Still worry that I wasted the best of me on you baby
[02:06.04]You don't care
[02:07.88]Said "Not tryna be a nuisance it's just urgent"
[02:10.93]Urgent
[02:11.92]Tryna make sense of loose change
[02:13.49]Got me a war in my mind
[02:14.97]My mind
[02:15.98]Gotta let go of weight can't keep what's holding me
[02:19.47]Choose to watch
[02:20.55]While the world break up and fall on me
[02:23.41]All the while I'll await my armored fate with a smile
[02:27.82]Still wanna try still believe in good days good days
[02:32.64]Always always always sunny inside
[02:36.93]Good day living in my mind
[02:38.89]SZA：
[02:39.09]Gotta get right tryna free my mind before the end of the world
[02:42.81]I don't miss no ex I don't miss no text
[02:45.09]I just choose not to respond
[02:47.36]I don't regret just pretend s**t never happened
[02:50.39]Half of us layin' waste and our youth is in the present
[02:58.51]Half of us chasin' fountains of youth and it's in the present
[04:02.32]Always on my mind always on my mind mind
[04:08.22]You've been making me feel like I'm
[04:10.08]Always on my mind always on my mind mind
data.trans:
[ti:Good Days (Explicit)]
[ar:SZA]
[al:Good Days (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.32]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.32]//
[00:04.09]//
[00:07.57]//
[00:23.91]美好的日子萦绕在我心头 放心大胆地迈出一步
[00:27.33]现在去透透气 展现你的优势
[00:30.41]为时过早 我说 你让我心情沉重
[00:33.41]你能否离开
[00:35.29]现在我需要休息 让我伤心不已
[00:38.37]宝贝 你总是如此
[00:42.83]我一直都感到心灵空虚
[00:46.76]我试着不让我完全迷失自我
[00:50.49]我担心我把最美好的样子都浪费在你身上 宝贝
[00:54.68]你毫不在乎
[00:56.43]说道 不想令人厌恶 只是迫在眉睫
[01:00.18]想要弄清楚鲜少交流的缘由
[01:01.98]让我心烦意乱
[01:04.56]我得放下沉重的包袱 不能让这段感情羁绊着我
[01:07.98]选择冷眼旁观
[01:09.39]当这个世界分崩离析 坠落在我身上
[01:11.39]//
[01:12.26]自始至终 我会面带微笑 等待我无懈可击的命运
[01:16.43]还想尝试 依然相信美好的日子
[01:21.74]永驻心间
[01:25.47]美好的日子萦绕在我心里
[01:27.70]把我的恐惧 我的局限告诉我
[01:32.25]我会消失不见 如果你让我
[01:35.30]感觉就像
[01:35.89]//
[01:36.89]感觉就像崩塌的耶利哥之城一样
[01:38.46]当他失去一切时 感觉就像圣经里的Joe一样
[01:39.98]咬牙坚持 独自承受我的考验
[01:43.18]付出代价 破坏心情
[01:48.65]我知道你乐在其中 情况愈发好转
[01:52.18]宝贝 我空虚的心负担过重
[01:58.20]我要阻止我完全迷失自我
[02:01.01]剩下的我
[02:02.12]我担心我把最美好的样子都浪费在你身上 宝贝
[02:06.04]你毫不在乎
[02:07.88]说道 不想令人厌恶 只是迫在眉睫
[02:10.93]迫在眉睫
[02:11.92]想要弄清楚鲜少交流的缘由
[02:13.49]让我心烦意乱
[02:14.97]我的心
[02:15.98]我得放下沉重的包袱 不能让这段感情羁绊着我
[02:19.47]选择冷眼旁观
[02:20.55]当这个世界分崩离析 坠落在我身上
[02:23.41]自始至终 我会面带微笑 等待我无懈可击的命运
[02:27.82]还想尝试 依然相信美好的日子
[02:32.64]内心永远阳光灿烂
[02:36.93]美好的日子萦绕在我心里
[02:38.89]//
[02:39.09]在世界末日来临之前 我要解放心灵
[02:42.81]我不会想念前任 我不会漏看消息
[02:45.09]我只是选择不回应
[02:47.36]我并不后悔 只是假装一切从未发生过
[02:50.39]我们一半的人虚掷光阴 我们的青春就在当下
[02:58.51]我们一半的人都在追逐青春的源泉 可这源泉就在当下
[04:02.32]总是萦绕在我心头 总是萦绕在我心头
[04:08.22]你一直让我觉得
[04:10.08]总是萦绕在我心头 总是萦绕在我心头
